RT @TodayFM: Mario Rosenstock (@GiftGrubMario) auditions for Louis Walsh, doing an impression of Louis himself! 😂
Mario's Sunday Roast - 1…

Because Twitter shouldn’t just be for givin’ out, I really want to compliment @lifestylesports for their really helpful staff today, both in Finglas and in Swords. Thanks a mil, sorry I didn’t get your names!

@LauraJHalton Photos of teenagers on life support did it for me. Always shocked and scared me. I never touched a drug (and I am very anti-drugs... I will not be around them, hate them.)

@ohaolain @GiftGrubMario @TodayFM Mario doing Mario - he doesn’t just do impressions! Such an interesting person... switch it on and give it a go. Particularly interesting panel on right now!

I was having such a lovely morning listening to @GiftGrubMario and now it’s after getting even better because former Producer Martin Maguire (I heart Martin) is one of his guests right now! @TodayFM #RoastMario

👏🏽👏🏽 yes! https://t.co/bWTHongkrv

Gimme 🤗

Good morning! Back on Early Breakfast this morning and it’s warm and sunny ☀️☀️☀️ Make a cup of tea and put your radio on... the perfect summer morning ☺️

@CrossyTweets @RosemaryMacCabe @MrKeithMahon @Thetaste_ie The best hotel close to Dublin and indeed the world is @Knightsbrook1 in Trim. It’s just fab and the spa there is lovely. And the club sandwich is the best in the world, fact.
RT @adamhess1: Harry Kane is 24. When I was 24 I fell asleep on the N68 night bus and when I woke up the bus was in a big car wash for buss…
@ArcticChimpanze Often wonder about dogs that bark non-stop. I’ve never had a dog so I wouldn’t know, but does that mean there’s something wrong with them? It’s bloody annoying.
Haha “go away Ellie.” Far far away. Bye 👋🏽 Calling another woman what she called her = horrible. #LoveIsland

If a person was told by someone they fancy that it’s between them and someone else, wouldn’t they just say “d’ya know what, forget it, you’re actually an arrogant ****.”
Not on #LoveIsland clearly. Have some self-respect 😑
